description:
Miguel was a hot as hell fucker that I met at a strip club one night with his buddy Tank (who we posted several weeks back) and they were just visiting post for some training for a couple of days. In fact, the night I met them, they were heading out the very next morning to return to the base they were stationed at.

They ended up staying at the house until daybreak so we could film and photograph them. I photographed Miguel then turned him over to Cole for his solo while I photographed Tank. Cole must have really gotten this boy excited as he did one hell of a solo. I was struck by just how damn gorgeous this boy was when I dug this out of the War Chest.
title: Miguel
